column5: I will be taking my dad up to Canada for the first his first time. He is not a diehard fisherman, so I figure I better plan one or two blow/weather days, as I know there is no way he is going to enjoy three footers... (Gene must have skipped a generation)Is there a casino in Kenora or Dryden? He does love those slots....Thanks,<{{}}><
There is a Casino in Kenora but it does not have slots, tables, keno and bingo, poker that's it
